I checked the release 2.2 build with Jboss 4.2.0GA and under linux OS. It worked well, no exception occured. Please try the release build. Thanks.

I believe that is what I'm running. 2_2_0, version from 6/26, available here:

http://europa-mirror1.eclipse.org/birt/downloads/build.php?build=R-R1-2_2_0-200706261010

?

> I checked the release 2.2 build with Jboss 4.2.0GA and under linux OS. It
> worked well, no exception occured. Please try the release build. Thanks.

I checked this build, and can't reproduce this issue yet. What about your JDK?I used JDK 1.5.0_09. Please use standard JDK.

I am running Sun JDK 1.5.0_12.

(In reply to comment #3)
> I checked this build, and can't reproduce this issue yet. What about your JDK?I
> used JDK 1.5.0_09. Please use standard JDK.
>

Oh, and I am not running X. The server has all X libraries installed, but is sitting in runlevel 3.

(In reply to comment #4)
> I am running Sun JDK 1.5.0_12.
> 
> (In reply to comment #3)
> > I checked this build, and can't reproduce this issue yet. What about your JDK?I

Can reproduce this issue when set linux run level as 3(text mode). If under level 5(graphic mode), it worked well.

Reassign to engine team for further research.
